languages.text: "Эта рабыня станет жертвой для моего господина. Пусть терзания ее души станут лакомством для пиршества Предела рассвета! А ты... возьми свою награду. И поверь — она не разочарует!"

traits.locale_text: "Эта рабыня станет жертвой для моего господина. Пусть терзания ее души станут лакомством для пиршества Предела рассвета! А ты... возьми свою награду. И поверь — она не разочарует!"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Boss

languages.text: "This puppet will be sacrificed to my master. Let the anguish of her soul become a delight at the feast of the Edge of Daybreak! As for you... Take your reward. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!"
languages.original_text: "Эта рабыня станет жертвой для моего господина. Пусть терзания ее души станут лакомством для пиршества Предела рассвета! А ты... возьми свою награду. И поверь — она не разочарует!"

traits.locale_text: "This puppet will be sacrificed to my master. Let the anguish of her soul become a delight at the feast of the Edge of Daybreak! As for you... Take your reward. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Boss

languages.text: 「この操り人形には、主人の犠牲になってもらう。彼女の魂の苦痛を暁の刃の喜びとせん！あなたには…報酬がある。大丈夫。失望はさせない」
languages.original_text: "This puppet will be sacrificed to my master. Let the anguish of her soul become a delight at the feast of the Edge of Daybreak! As for you... Take your reward. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: 「この操り人形には、主人の犠牲になってもらう。彼女の魂の苦痛を暁の刃の喜びとせん！あなたには…報酬がある。大丈夫。失望はさせない」
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Boss

languages.text: “既然如此，就把这个傀儡先给我的主人吧。让她灵魂的痛苦，为破晓锋刃带来欢愉的盛宴！至于你……收下这件报酬吧。相信我，你是不会失望的！”
languages.original_text: "This puppet will be sacrificed to my master. Let the anguish of her soul become a delight at the feast of the Edge of Daybreak! As for you... Take your reward. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，就把这个傀儡先给我的主人吧。让她灵魂的痛苦，为破晓锋刃带来欢愉的盛宴！至于你……收下这件报酬吧。相信我，你是不会失望的！”
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Boss

languages.text: « Cette pitoyable marionnette sera sacrifiée en l'honneur de mon maître. La Lame de l'Aube se repaîtra de son âme tourmentée ! Quant à vous... Prenez votre récompense. Je vous garantis que vous ne serez pas {mf|déçu|déçue} ! »
languages.original_text: "This puppet will be sacrificed to my master. Let the anguish of her soul become a delight at the feast of the Edge of Daybreak! As for you... Take your reward. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: « Cette pitoyable marionnette sera sacrifiée en l'honneur de mon maître. La Lame de l'Aube se repaîtra de son âme tourmentée ! Quant à vous... Prenez votre récompense. Je vous garantis que vous ne serez pas {mf|déçu|déçue} ! »
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Boss

languages.text: «Sacrificaré esta marioneta a mi amo. ¡Que su angustia sea una de las delicias en el festín del Filo del Amanecer! En cuanto a ti... toma, tu recompensa. ¡No te decepcionará!».
languages.original_text: "This puppet will be sacrificed to my master. Let the anguish of her soul become a delight at the feast of the Edge of Daybreak! As for you... Take your reward. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: «Sacrificaré esta marioneta a mi amo. ¡Que su angustia sea una de las delicias en el festín del Filo del Amanecer! En cuanto a ti... toma, tu recompensa. ¡No te decepcionará!».
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Boss

languages.text: "Diese Marionette wird meinem Meister geopfert. Ihre Seelenqual soll eine Freude beim Festmahl des Rands des Tagesanbruchs werden! Und was Euch angeht ... nehmt Eure Belohnung. Glaubt mir, Ihr werdet nicht enttäuscht sein!"
languages.original_text: "This puppet will be sacrificed to my master. Let the anguish of her soul become a delight at the feast of the Edge of Daybreak! As for you... Take your reward. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: "Diese Marionette wird meinem Meister geopfert. Ihre Seelenqual soll eine Freude beim Festmahl des Rands des Tagesanbruchs werden! Und was Euch angeht ... nehmt Eure Belohnung. Glaubt mir, Ihr werdet nicht enttäuscht sein!"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Boss

languages.text: "Bu kukla, efendim için kurban edilecek. Onun ruhunun azabı, Tan Vakti'nin enfes ziyafeti olsun. Sana gelince... Ödülünü al ve güven bana: Pişman olmayacaksın!"
languages.original_text: "This puppet will be sacrificed to my master. Let the anguish of her soul become a delight at the feast of the Edge of Daybreak! As for you... Take your reward. Believe me, you won't be disappointed!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu kukla, efendim için kurban edilecek. Onun ruhunun azabı, Tan Vakti'nin enfes ziyafeti olsun. Sana gelince... Ödülünü al ve güven bana: Pişman olmayacaksın!"
traits.speaker: ItsTime_Afterlight_Boss
